content.rendered:
Play Free Rider HD : Race bikes on tracks + Best Games Like Canvas Rider

Free Rider has endless content and is the ultimate boredom killer!

Ride through the Quest game to get the star (to your right) or go behind for the arcade! Choose your game! Most importantly, have fun!

Free Rider HD is the official replacement to Canvas Rider.

The game is written in HTML5 to work on desktop, tablet and mobile.

Play Free Rider HD

Free Rider HD is a platform racing browser game

developed by Canadian studio Kano/Apps and Polish studio One More Level, with player-created levels. It was released on web browsers in 2014 and brought to mobile devices (iOS and Android operating systems) in 2017. By 2017, it had over 300,000 player-created tracks and a total of over 1 billion plays online.

Race against millions of players head to head! Every track is player drawn! If you hit a track you don’t like, skip it and ride on!

Free Rider has endless content and is the ultimate boredom killer!

How do you play the game Rider?

The game uses a simple one-click control mechanism. You just have to hold your left click mouse button to accelerate and to flip your bike. As you progress and earn points you can unlock some new and fantastic bike models.

Race bikes on tracks drawn by other players or draw your own! Official Free Rider sequel and replacement to Canvas Rider.

Free Rider HD gameplay

The gameplay consists of riding a bicycle with a stick figure through a track.
Almost all of the tracks in Free Rider HD are created and published by other players on the website, and it contains levels of many different difficulties. The game has a 2D level and character design, although there are more elaborate shading and depth graphics. It is displayed in high definition resolution. Rider features physics-based objects and ragdoll physics on the player.

Ride your little stick bike on user-generated tracks!

Free Rider has long been used in classrooms all over the world as a learning tool. Teachers have found that creating tracks has a strong link to programming logic, develops persistence, and provides a fun environment to put basic science principles to use. Let us know if you have any learning related requests for your school!

Features:

  • race on over 80 campaign tracks to earn gold, silver and bronze medals
  • over 50,000 player drawn tracks
  • compete on world + friend leaderboards
  • multiplayer racing
  • daily and lifetime achievements
  • customize your rider and vehicle in The Shop
  • draw your own track & share with the world!
  • FREE to play with regular updates
  • cross device compatibility on mobile phone, tablet and desktop
  • High Definition for crystal clear racing
  • save best time ghosts to challenge friends
  • fun ragdoll physics
  • easy to learn and fun to play, difficult to master!
  • BMX and MTB bikes
  • official replacement to Canvas Rider

Free Rider in HTML5

Works in all modern browsers including desktop, mobile phones, tablets and consoles (XBox One, Wii U). Game is currently in beta featuring asynchronous multi-player racing, level creator (support for mobile/tablet in progress) and 1000s of top player created tracks from Free Rider 2 & 3.

Best Games Like Free Rider HD

We have a large collection of games that are similar to Free Rider HD for you to play, such as SUV Challenge, Red Driver 3, Stunt Rider and many more.

Bicycle Stunt Racing

Bicycle Stunt Racing is a Sports, Racing, and Single-player video game developed by Khodiyar Games. All through the game, the player gets engaged in a mountain cycling race following the real physics with cartoon graphics. As a mountain bike rider, all a player needs is to show BMX skills on unparalleled ramps by paddling a bicycle. Besides this, the player can also compete in timed races on more than 20 different mountains against online cyclists.

BMX FE3D 2

BMX FE3D 2 is a Sports, Cycling, and Single-player video game developed by EnJen Games. All through the game, the player, while getting on the bike, has to ride big ramps and perform technical street skating. The mission is to do huge flips and stunts in the air without being fallen. Besides this, the player can chain the stunts together to generate awesome combos with grinds and wallrides.

Ride: BMX FREE

Ride: BMX FREE is a Sports, Cycling, and Single-player video game developed by rebelnow. All through the game, the player plays like a true cyclist whose main mission is to ride BMX and master a variety of tricks to become a pro. The player can earn achievements and unlock several BMX bikes from real brands.

Waterpark Bicycle Surfing

Waterpark Bicycle Surfing is an Adventure, Sports, Cycling, and Single-player video game developed by Futuristic Game Studio. All through the game, the player on a bicycle has to perform stunts over the water’s surface and cross a variety of wooden logs and hurdles scattered across the course. It is an addictive game with no shooting missions and combat scenarios.

BMX Cycle Race

BMX Cycle Race is a Sports, Racing, Bicycling, Single-player, and Multiplayer video game developed and published by Advance Generation Tech. All through the game, the player has to perform real cycling stunts in the races with AI opponents. The game has included many different BMX models, so grab the fastest model and become a fearless rider to lead the leaderboard.

Free Rider HD Alternatives

Free Rider HD is described as ‘Race bikes on tracks drawn by other players or draw your own!

Official Free Rider sequel and replacement to Canvas Rider’ and is a Racing Game in the Games category. There are eight games similar to Free Rider HD for a variety of platforms, including Online / Web-based, Android, Windows, Linux and Mac. The best alternative is XMoto, which is both free and Open Source.

Other Free Rider HD like games are Trials Frontier (Free), Happy Wheels, Trials 2 and Gravity Defied – Trial Racing.

XMoto

X-Moto is a challenging 2D motocross platform game, where physics plays an all important role in the gameplay. You need to control your bike to its limits, if you want to have a chance to finish the most difficult challenges.

Trials Frontier

Discover unique social racing game. Represent entire series of Trials Frontier games.

Happy Wheels

Happy Wheels is a ragdoll physics-based, browser game created by Jim Bonacci. The game features several playable characters who use different, sometimes atypical vehicles to traverse the game’s levels.

Trials 2

Trials2 provides Trials-game fans even further developed physics model and core gameplay-features.

Gravity Defied – Trial Racing

Gravity Defied – Trial Racing [GDTR] is a motorcycle trial racing game bringing realistic physics to the mobile platform. The objective of the game is to race as quickly as possibly through the obstacle-ridden courses. The robust physics engine used in GDTR allows for both racing and trial style challenges.

Whether you are trying to maintain good traction along the racing course or gain maximum altitude to overcome an obstacle, reality is realisticly mirrored. No two challenges are the same and almost any challenge can be solved using different approaches.

Ultimate Stunt Champ

Ultimate Stunt champ is an extreme bike racing game for free. Your task is to ride the bike through the challenging tracks and reach the destination. Collect the stars and perform stunts to make a high-score. A very entertaining bike racing game for gamers.

What happened Canvas Rider?

Canvas Rider is an experiment whose aim is to collect & render Free Rider tracks with HTML5. It’s now been taken over by Kano Games’ Free Rider HD.

Is free rider HD free?

FREE to play with regular updates – cross device compatibility on mobile phone, tablet and desktop – High Definition for crystal clear racing – save best time ghosts to challenge friends – fun ragdoll physics – easy to learn and fun to play, difficult to master!

Also read :

  • Pokemon Go current Raid bosses: Mega Raids, Ex Raids, Remote Raids, Raid Battles
  • Epic to host Concept Royale in Fortnite and the Conditions for submitting + Tow away beach
  • How to train your tracking in Apex Legends? What are some ways to get better at shooting in the game?
  • Genshin Impact Guide to Drink-A-Dreaming Event Guide, Emergency Food, A Returning Customer Daily Commission in  
  • The Best Gaming Headsets in 2022 and How do we test them
  • 15 Best Browser Games In 2022 To Play Online
